Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a big win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said. "Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I Roy think a game like this is going to help us down the road." Elias Says Allen Iverson

starting from April 4 will be in charge of Google's day-to-day operations as the CEO. "In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly," Eric Schmidt said. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better. Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, Eric Schmidt wrote. That was such a stain on our country, he tells ABC News' Diane Sawyer in an interviewed "I stepped up and told the president I thought I should resign," he says. case stemming from a Jan. 23, 2010 incident in downtown Aspen. It's the "douche bag" phrase that has riled up Maytin. In July she filed a six-page court brief- aptly titled Motion to Dismiss: The Constitutionality of "Douche Bag." Maytin contended that the disorderly conduct charge should have been dropped because Fordham was protected by free speech. She cited numerous sources to back her claim- ranging from Wikipedia to the Urban Dictionary to David Letterman . Use
